data.actual_result: Black bar stays there, blocking the beautiful magnifying glass.
data.expected_result: Black bar disappears since there is no results and nowhere to scroll.
data.short_description: If you type another letter into the invite DM box which causes no results to be found while scrolled down, there is a high chance the black bar separating the search bar and the selection area does not go away until another letter is typed again.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a combination of search terms that cause the results page go from scrollable to no results once you type another character. - In my case, typing one "b" filters some results, and the selection area is scrollable. Typing another "b" immediately gives me no results. Make sure this is met first!! - Clear your input. Type whatever first character you entered first. - Scroll down the selection area and make sure the black bar pops up. It only appears when you are scrolled down. - Press that character that makes you get no result. In my case, it's the second "b" character. - The below
